description:
I am playing around with nova-manage right now, it is not possible to ... 
- list defined roles, a command like 'nova-manage roles list' is missing, only "add", "has" and "remove"
- delete defined networks - I can define new networks but not delete them like "nova-manage network delete"
- list defined volumes, a command like "nova-manage volume list" is missing
title: nova-manage is missing some core functionality

comments.content:
I am playing around with nova-manage right now, it is not possible to ... 
- list defined roles, a command like 'nova-manage roles list' is missing, only "add", "has" and "remove"
- delete defined networks - I can define new networks but not delete them like "nova-manage network delete"
- list defined volumes, a command like "nova-manage volume list" is missing
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~baumann-b1-systems

comments.content:
I added the ability to delete networks as per https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/722982 .
I'm now having a look at listing roles, will engage with listing volumes once I'm done.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rcarrillocruz

comments.content:
This issue is pretty out of date.  A _LOT_ has changed sincee this was filed.

Role management is over in keystone now.

Volume management is over in Cinder.

Almost everything else that was in nova-manage has been, or is being migrated to admin API extensions.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
